pr_title: [ML] allow unran/incomplete forecasts to be deleted for stopped/failed jobs

timeline.message: [ML] allow unran/incomplete forecasts to be deleted for stopped/failed jobs

timeline.bodyText:
You could just replace this with a comment that the test is that no exception is thrown.  JUnit will fail tests that throw exceptions, and we'll still get the stack trace.  Catching and calling fail will actually lose the stack trace of any completely unexpected exception that happens to get thrown.
Same on lines 58-60.
timeline.author: droberts195
